metadata.description:
Performer = Various Artists

Year = 2017

Genre = Electronic/Hardstyle

Format = Opus ~128

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hard Bass 2017 (CD 1: Mixed By Da Tweekaz)

Adrenalize - Robot love
Audiofreq - Audiofile.001
Audiofreq - The grid
Audiotricz - What about us (& Atmozfears)
Code Black - Wild ones (ft Elle Vee)
Coone & Da Tweekaz - D.W.X. (10 Years Dirty Workz mix)

Cyber - Lost Town
D.E.Q - Dubnium
Darren Styles - Come running (Atmozfears remix)
Darren Styles - Save me (Wasted Penguinz remix)
Da Tweekaz - DRKNSS (& Sub Zero Project)

Devin Wild - Components of matter
Ecstatic - Hold you
Josh & Wesz - Believe
NSCLT - Do it
Paul Elstak - Luv U more (Da Tweekaz remix)
Raw Harmony - My night (& GSB)
Refuzion - Move ya
Sephyx - You got the rhythm (ft Mr. Shammi)
Wasted Penguinz - Take me away (& Crisis Era)


Hard Bass 2017 (CD 2: Mixed By Bass Modulators)

Armin van Buuren - Dominator (Bass Modulators remix) (vs Human Resource)

Bass Modulators - Let it move ya

Bass Modulators - Oxygen (Orchestral edit)
Bass Modulators - Requi3m
Brennan Heart - God complex (& Zatox)

Devin Wild - Meltdown (& Sub Zero Project)
Galactixx - Unfold
JNXD - Spectrum of sound
Noisecontrollers - Het gevoel van (Hard Bass edit) (& Bass Modulators)

Noisecontrollers - Samara
Noisecontrollers - Savannah
Noisecontrollers - See the light (& Bass Modulators)
The Prophet - Mission impossible (& The Ultimate MC)
Wildstylez - A complex situation
Wildstylez - Cats, jets and breaks (& Noisecontrollers)
Wildstylez - Make the crowd move (& Villain)


Hard Bass 2017 (CD 3: Mixed By Phuture Noize)

Adaro - Bring you the pain (& Digital Punk)
Adaro - Smack (& Hard Driver)
Apexx - AK-47
Audiofreq - Timebomb
B-Front - The paradox (& Phuture Noize)
Break Zero - Vengeance
Delete - Genocide
Digital Punk - Bring it to 'em raw (& Sub Sonik)
Donkey Rollers - The fusion of sound
Hard Driver - Reloaded (& Radical Redemption)
Krowdexx - Get paid (& Enemy Contact)
Phuture Noize - Fire
Phuture Noize - I got noize
Phuture Noize - The grind
Phuture Noize - The temple
Phuture Noize - The worlds beyond
Phuture Noize - Walls crashin' down
Prefix & Density - Feel it (vs The Vision)
Ran-D - Blinded (& Alpha2)
Regain - Don't look down (& Phuture Noize)
Udex - Final theory


Hard Bass 2017 (CD 4: Mixed By E-Force)

Alpha2 - Betrayal (Sub Zero Project remix)
Crypsis - Torture (Frequencerz remix) (& Luna)
Crypsis - You know (Minus Militia remix)
Digital Punk - Hate on me
E-Force - Attack (& Bass Chaserz)
E-Force - Boomstick
E-Force - Kill the noise (& Luna)
Gunz for Hire - No mercy
High Voltage - Nasty bitch (& D-Sturb)
Kronos - AHAH (& Malua)
Minus Militia - Prodigious
Ncrypta - Helix
Rebelion - Mayday (& Delete)

War Force - Triumph
